tools.title: Set a background image
tools.body: Personalize your program by setting a custom background image!

buttons.label: Check it out
buttons.click: var adv = require('./modules/menus/settings/advancedSettings'); adv(); notification(`This menu can be found in Settings>Advanced settings>Select image`)

miscellaneous.title: Feature requests
miscellaneous.body: Do you want to help us improve the program? Are there some features that you really want? Click the button below to send us a feature request!

buttons.label: Do it now
buttons.click: openFeatureForm(); notification(`The form has been opened in your default browser.`)
